title: Egnatia, Byzacena
text:
Egnatia, Byzacena is an <a href="ancient%20history">ancient</a> <a href="civitas">civitas</a> of the <a href="Roman%20Province">Roman Province</a> of <a href="Byzacena">Byzacena</a> in <a href="North%20Africa">North Africa</a>. The exact location of the town is not known, but was in the <a href="Sahel%2C%20Tunisia">Sahel region</a> of <a href="Tunisia">Tunisia</a>.
The town was in ancient times the <a href="cathedra">seat</a> of an ancient <a href="Roman%20Catholic">Roman Catholic</a> <a href="bishopric">bishopric</a>. Today the bishopric survives as a <a href="titular%20Bishop">titular Bishop</a>ric and the current <a href="bishop">bishop</a> of the town is <a href="Dionisio%20Lachovicz">Dionisio Lachovicz</a>.
